arts.ttl: “Right path” | Potter delight as Hammers claim big 3 points
arts.sum: Graham Potter is understandably delighted to finish off the week with back-to-back Premier League wins. West Ham overcame Leicester City 2-0 at the London Stadium, following the win over Arsenal on Saturday to cap off an excellent week and one that give hope for a positive end to this season. arts.ttl: Journalist moots Ruud van Nistelrooy sack after West Ham win v Leicester
arts.sum: Ruud van Nistelrooy may face the sack after West Ham United beat Leicester City 2-0 in the Premier League. The London Stadium hosted Leicester on... The post Journalist moots Ruud van Nistelrooy sack after West Ham win v Leicester appeared first on West Ham Zone.

arts.ttl: Ruud van Nistelrooy turns on Leicester stars as pressure piles on Man Utd legend
arts.sum: Leicester were beaten 2-0 by West Ham on Thursday and Ruud van Nistelrooy was hugely critical of his side's performance, with the Foxes now five points from safety

arts.ttl: West Ham midfielder Tomas Soucek sends message to Tottenham in wake of last night's win over Leicester
arts.sum: There’s no love lost between West Ham United and Tottenham Hotspur, two London clubs that have a pretty strong rivalry. While Tottenham’s main rivals are...

arts.ttl: Friday briefing: Pressure increases on Ruud van Nistelrooy
arts.sum: The Foxes have now lost 11 of their last 12 matches, while attention is set to switch again to the FA Cup as Aston Villa host Cardiff on Friday night

arts.ttl: “Transform” | West Ham’s London stadium could undertake huge change
arts.sum: West Ham’s London Stadium could be revolutionised with the right naming deal. The large majority of home and away fans hate the London Stadium; it’s simply not built for football. Creating strong atmospheres is a massive challenge, viewing from most seats is awful, and it doesn’t help given what West Ham once had. Unfortunately, things... arts.ttl: Ruud van Nistelrooy vows to ‘keep going’ after another Leicester defeat
arts.sum: The Foxes were beaten at West Ham.

arts.ttl: 'We are still in the fight' - just how bad does it look for Leicester?
arts.sum: Leicester boss Ruud van Nistelrooy insists his side are 'still in the fight' to stay up despite suffering an 11th loss in 12 Premier League games at West Ham.

arts.ttl: Leicester 'too passive' in West Ham defeat - Van Nistelrooy
arts.sum: Leicester City manager Ruud van Nistelrooy says his side were "too passive" in their 2-0 defeat at West Ham United.

arts.ttl: West Ham beat Leicester to claim back-to-back victories
arts.sum: Leicester picked up what seemed like a vital 3-1 win over West Ham in the reverse fixture back in December in Ruud van Nistelrooy ’s first match in charge, but the Foxes were devoid of energy and ideas this time around. West Ham United made it back-to-back Premier League wins by seeing off struggling Leicester City 2-0 at the London Stadium on Thursday.
